text:
It is amazing the kinds of new hobbies you
can pick up while on the road.

Over the last year we've had the opportunity
to try kayaking in both Vietnam and Finland.

When the opportunity came to try it in the
Whitsundays with Salty Dog we jumped at the

At times it was hard to concentrate on paddling
given the spectacular scenery of the Whitsunday

During the outing we also got to spend a bit
of time relaxing on an island with a pristine

Overall, we'd recommend sea kayaking to just
about anyone given that it is a safe and fun
